title: Avokiwi
author: Avokiwi
created_time: April 12, 2023, 10:21:37 AMLast edit: April 18, 2023, 12:09:22 PM by Avokiwi

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: My advice is that you should not post addresses and ask for donation because that according to forum/community rules is considered as begging and moderators will remove such posts. Here is how this ecosystem works, here people are looking to get money and not give, though giving depends on circumstances, a newbie asking for it is not gonna work, you should visit bounty section and services to see if there might be some opportunities to earn on your own, asking for cash doesn't cut it around these woods.ðŸ˜‰ Good luck and hope you get better financially.~dig.

comments.author: Avokiwi
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on April 12, 2023, 05:46:53 PMMy advice is that you should not post addresses and ask for donation because that according to forum/community rules is considered as begging and moderators will remove such posts. Here is how this ecosystem works, here people are looking to get money and not give, though giving depends on circumstances, a newbie asking for it is not gonna work, you should visit bounty section and services to see if there might be some opportunities to earn on your own, asking for cash doesn't cut it around these woods.ðŸ˜‰ Good luck and hope you get better financially.~dig.Hello, and thank you for your thoughtful advice. I genuinely appreciate your input, and I apologize if my request came across as inappropriate for this community.I want to assure you that I am actively seeking ways to improve my financial situation, and I am not solely relying on the generosity of others. Your suggestion to explore the bounty and services sections is valuable, and I will certainly consider these opportunities as I continue my efforts to overcome these challenges.Again, thank you for taking the time to offer guidance and for your well-wishes. I am grateful for your support, and I hope to contribute positively to this community as I learn and grow in the world of cryptocurrency.Best regards,Avokiwi
